files.name: drawer-content.svelte
files.content: {@render children?.()}

files.name: drawer-description.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Drawer as DrawerPrimitive } from "vaul-svelte";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  class: className,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<DrawerPrimitive.Description
	bind:ref
	class={cn("text-muted-foreground text-sm", className)}
	{...restProps}
/>

files.name: drawer-footer.svelte
files.content: {@render children?.()}

files.name: drawer-header.svelte
files.content: {@render children?.()}

files.name: drawer-nested.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Drawer as DrawerPrimitive } from "vaul-svelte";
let {
  shouldScaleBackground = true,
  open = $bindable(false),
  activeSnapPoint = $bindable(null),
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<DrawerPrimitive.NestedRoot {shouldScaleBackground} bind:open bind:activeSnapPoint {...restProps} />

files.name: drawer-overlay.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Drawer as DrawerPrimitive } from "vaul-svelte";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  class: className,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<DrawerPrimitive.Overlay
	bind:ref
	class={cn("fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/80", className)}
	{...restProps}
/>

files.name: drawer-title.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Drawer as DrawerPrimitive } from "vaul-svelte";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  class: className,
  ...restProps

<DrawerPrimitive.Title
	bind:ref

files.name: drawer.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Drawer as DrawerPrimitive } from "vaul-svelte";
let {
  shouldScaleBackground = true,
  open = $bindable(false),
  activeSnapPoint = $bindable(),
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<DrawerPrimitive.Root {shouldScaleBackground} bind:open bind:activeSnapPoint {...restProps} />

files.name: index.js
